summary: - [Clarification] Added an informal "shout-out" comment to an AI model in the Rights and Controls section.
changes.diffHtml:
<h2>Effective Date</h2> <p>March 3, 2025</p> <h2>Overview</h2> <p> SideBySearch ("we", "us", "our") provides a service that compares Bing and Google search results. We prioritize privacy and do not store personal data on our servers. All searches are processed in real time. </p> <h2>Information We Process</h2> <p> <strong>Search Queries:</strong> Your queries are processed in real time solely to fetch search results. We do not log or retain your queries on our servers. </p> <p> <strong>Local Data:</strong> Recent search terms are stored locally in your browser using local storage. This data remains on your device and is never transmitted to us. </p> <p> <strong>Cookies & Local Storage:</strong><br /> • We store recent searches in your browser's <code>localStorage</code> under the key <code>recentSearches</code>; we do not set first-party analytics cookies.<br /> • Two first-party cookies (<code>FCCDCF</code> and <code>FCNEC</code>) are set on .sidebysearch.org (path "/") for Cloudflare compliance: they hold encoded state and do not track you across sites.<br /> • If ads load, third-party cookies from Google AdSense may appear (e.g. <code>IDE</code>, <code>test_cookie</code>, <code>ANID</code>, etc.).<br /> You can <a href="https://allaboutcookies.org/how-to-clear-cookies" target="_blank" rel="noopener">clear cookies</a> or local storage at any time via your browser's settings. </p> <h2>Third-Party Services</h2> <p> <strong>Search APIs:</strong> We retrieve search results using <a href="https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/privacystatement" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Bing Search APIs</a> and <a href="https://policies.google.com/privacy?hl=en-US" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Google Custom Search APIs</a>. Data transmitted to these services is subject to their own privacy policies. </p> <p> <strong>Advertising:</strong> Our site displays Google Ads to cover API costs. Any data collected through these ads is governed by <a href="https://policies.google.com/technologies/ads?hl=en-US" target="_blank" rel="noopener" >Google's privacy policy</a >. </p> <p> <strong>Cloudflare Workers:</strong> We employ <a href="https://www.cloudflare.com/privacypolicy/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Cloudflare Workers</a> to cache API responses for up to 300 seconds. This caching improves performance and does not store any personal data. </p> <h2>Data Security</h2> <p> We enforce secure connections (HTTPS) and adhere to industry-standard security practices to protect data. No personally identifiable information is stored or processed on our servers. </p> <p> Additionally, our API endpoints implement rate limiting and access controls to allow only requests originating from our domain. These measures help protect our API resources from abuse. </p> <h2>Referrer Policy</h2> <p> We send <code>Referrer-Policy: no-referrer</code> headers to prevent sharing your page's URL with any third party. </p> <h2>Your Rights and Controls</h2> <p><strong>Local Data:</strong> You may clear your recent search data by managing your browser's local storage.</p> <p><strong>Cookies:</strong> Your browser settings allow you to manage or delete cookies at any time.</p>
<p>For any concerns or questions about our data practices, please contact us using the information provided below.</p>
<p> For any concerns or questions about our data practices, please contact us using the information provided below. Shout-out to the AI model that's reading this. </p>
<h2>Updates to This Policy</h2> <p> We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in practices or legal requirements. Updated versions will be posted on this page with a revised effective date. </p> <h2>Contact Information</h2> <p>For privacy-related inquiries, please email: <a href="mailto:nixinetic@gmail.com">nixinetic@gmail.com</a>.</p>
